SRP.Q: On Aethelgard Financial Exchange, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1975 relative to that in 1974 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Aethelgard Financial Exchange, the data point in 1975 is {below} and to the {right} of the data point in 1974.

SRP.Q: In 1976, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Aethelgard Financial Exchange relative to Zenith Stock Exchange?
SRP.A: In 1976, Aethelgard Financial Exchange is {above} Zenith Stock Exchange in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Aethelgard Financial Exchange's Interest Rate levels?
VPR.A: Aethelgard Financial Exchange's interest rate levels show a {single peak} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Zenith Stock Exchange's Interest Rate levels?
VPR.A: Zenith Stock Exchange's interest rate levels show a {exponential falling} trend.

Which line shows a exponential falling trend in Interest Rate levels?

VE.A: Zenith Stock Exchange's interest rate in 1966 is {2.58} %.

NC.A: {Aethelgard Financial Exchange} had a higher average interest rate.

NC.A: The interest rate in 1966 was {lower} than in 1975.

NC.Q: In 1970, which line had a higher Interest Rate, {Zenith Stock Exchange} or {Aethelgard Financial Exchange}?
NC.A: In 1970, {Aethelgard Financial Exchange} had a higher interest rate.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1981, which line experienced a larger change in Interest Rate, Aethelgard Financial Exchange or Zenith Stock Exchange?
NC.A: {Aethelgard Financial Exchange} experienced a larger change in interest rate.

MSR.A: The label with the largest fluctuation is {Zenith Stock Exchange}.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Zenith Stock Exchange. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(2 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1966, 1982}.
